name: mk-toasty
description: Make the Mortal Kombat toasty guy pop out on your site.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserify -t es6-arrow-function index.js > dist/toasty.js
scripts.build:standalone: mkdir -p dist && browserify -t es6-arrow-function index.js --standalone toasty > dist/toasty.js
scripts.example: mkdir -p example/dist && browserify -t es6-arrow-function example/main.js > example/dist/main.js && cp example/index.html example/dist/index.html

author: Zak Angelle
